title: Can the FCC-hh prove the B-L gauge symmetry?
summary: We present a phenomenological study of the discovery potential at the FCC-hh for a new heavy neutral vector boson, Z', predicted by the $U(1)_{B-L}$ gauge symmetry. Focusing on the parameter space currently not excluded by Large Hadron Collider data, we analyze the dilepton production channel $p p \rightarrow Z^{\prime} \rightarrow l^{+} l^{-}$ ($l^{\pm} = e^{\pm}, μ^{\pm}$) at a center-of-mass energy of $\sqrt{s} = 100$ TeV. Full Monte Carlo simulations was performed for different ($M_{Z'}$, $g
